messages.subject: Re: Unschooling Groups
messages.msgSnippet: We are in Eugene. ... group ... at yahoo groups.
messages.messageBody:
We are in Eugene.



Mark Shields <shields@o...> wrote:
> Jennefer, where are you in OR? We are trying to get an unschooling
group
> going in Central Oregon (Bend, Redmond),...It's called COunschool
at yahoo groups.
>

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Groups
messages.msgSnippet: Jennefer, where are you in OR?  We are trying to get an unschooling group going in Central Oregon (Bend, Redmond), but it s pretty small so far.  It would be
messages.messageBody:
Jennefer, where are you in OR? We are trying to get an unschooling group
going in Central Oregon (Bend, Redmond), but it's pretty small so far. It
would be great to have you join. It's called COunschool at yahoo groups.
We've gotten together twice, but so far it's only been two families.

-----Original Message-----
From: jennefer harper [mailto:jenneferh2000@...]

Do any of ya'll participate in an unschooling (not
homeschooling) group or association? There seem to be numerous
homeschooling organizations, but I have seen few, if any unschooling
organizations.

-Jennefer in Oregon

messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Groups
messages.msgSnippet: I do.  A friend of mine and I couldn t find one, so we started our own.  We don t have a name, but we have a local e-mail list and schedule regular (or
messages.messageBody:
I do. A friend of mine and I couldn't find one, so we started our own. We
don't have a name, but we have a local e-mail list and schedule regular (or
irregular!) get-togethers.


Marjorie

-----Original Message-----
From: jennefer harper [mailto:jenneferh2000@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 2004 12:48 PM
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Groups


Do any of ya'll participate in an unschooling (not
homeschooling) group or association? There seem to be numerous
homeschooling organizations, but I have seen few, if any unschooling
organizations.

-Jennefer in Oregon
